EmailTemplate.subject: Take on Tough Landings with Synthetic Vision! ✈
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://standardaero.com/]]>
Honeywell's Synthetic Vision System (SVS) is an advanced feature available with the Primus Elite upgrade that makes flying into the world’s most challenging airports easier by giving you a view of the terrain, as well as additional information like the runway outline, the breadcrumb trail leading to the runway and the plane’s exact flight path. The increased level of situational awareness you’ll experience with SVS will pay dividends when flying to unfamiliar locations, in bad weather, or at night.
WATCH: PILOTS TALK ABOUT FLYING INTO THE WORLD'S MOST CHALLENGING AIRPORTS IN THE U.S. <[[https://youtu.be/jSsCnl_OHrI]]>
For a limited time, Honeywell and StandardAero are offering customers the opportunity to save when they bundle Primus Elite Enhanced Features and Primus Elite Advanced Features with Synthetic Vision. You'll also have the option to purchase SmartRunway and SmartLanding at a 50% discount.
Take on the world’s most challenging airports with confidence! Click below to learn more or to request a quote from StandardAero.
